t: Amazon.com: Shalom Sesame, Vol. 5 : NA, NA: Movies & TV
s: This DVD Contains Two Episodes: 1. Passover 2. Kids Sing Israel This is my kid's favorite DVD of the Shalom Sesame Series. The Passover episode does a wonderful job of teaching basic concepts of Passover for ages 3 to 5 with Sarah Jessica Parker among others.

t: Watch Shalom Sesame - Be Happy, It's Purim! | Prime Video
s: Everyone's dressing up for Purim, so get out your groggers and join the fun! Avigail is inspired by the story of Esther. Moishe Oofnik is his usual grouchy self...but who is that mysterious masked singer at the Purim Spiel? From the award-winning best-selling Jewish children's series Shalom Sesame.

t: Watch Shalom Sesame - Adventures in Israel | Prime Video
s: Anneliese's adventures in Israel are almost over, but there are still so many sights to see before she goes. Meanwhile, Grover explores Israel his own way. From the award-winning best-selling Jewish children's series Shalom Sesame.

t: Shalom Sesame - Wikipedia
s: 5 days ago - Shalom Sesame was produced in 1986 and between 1990 and 1991 for the direct-to-video market in the United States, aimed at introducing Israel and Judaism to children that are not necessarily fluent in the Hebrew language, since Rechov Sumsum is completely done in Hebrew.
